subject: Athletics and Sports
Human Growth Hormone
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez still appears to have some unfinished business with federal authorities, who continue to want to question him in connection with the investigation of the Toronto-based doctor Anthony Galea.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez still appears to have some unfinished business with federal authorities, who continue to want to question him in connection with the investigation of the Toronto-based doctor Anthony Galea.
